== About ==
 Trying to find a peaceful place to encourage ladies' participation to the OpenSource Community.

==== Goals of this Team ====
1. Welcome new Ladies.
2. Sharing moving the community with ideas.
3. Perfecting activities(like events).

==== Current Manager ====

== Joining ==
==== Joining  Requirements: ====
1. Restricted to females only.
2. Understanding Team's goals and ideas.

==== Joining Steps ====
1. Register yourself on launchpad.net, '''<nowiki>[[https://login.launchpad.net/+new_account|here]]</nowiki>'''. 
2. Then join the Ubuntu Egypt Women Team, '''<nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-eg-women|here]]</nowiki>'''.
3. Send and e-mail to the  introducing yourself :) (''Welcome'').
